be.uantwerpen.fti.ds.sc.smartracecar.common

Class JSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.uantwerpen.fti.ds.sc.smartracecar.common.JSONUtils

  • public class JSONUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Help functions to deal with JSON messages. Uses Google GSON library.

      • isJSONValid

        public static boolean isJSONValid(java.lang.String jsonInString)
        Method to verify if string is a valid JSON string.
        Parameters:
        jsonInString - String to be verified.
        Returns:
        boolean to state if the string is valid JSON. True means valid.

      • getFirst

        public static java.lang.String getFirst(java.lang.String jsonInString)
        Get the first word of the JSON object. In this case this is always the keyword used in the message.
        Parameters:
        jsonInString - String to be searched for the keyword.
        Returns:
        String that the holds the found keyword.

      • getObjectWithKeyWord

        public static java.lang.Object getObjectWithKeyWord(java.lang.String jsonInString,
                                                    java.lang.reflect.Type t)
        Get the object after the keyword of the JSON object. This is always the package of the message. Converts it to the correct requested Java Object type.
        Parameters:
        jsonInString - String to be searched for the object.
        t - Type of the object being searched.
        Returns:
        Object that was requested

      • getObject

        public static java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String jsonInString,
                                         java.lang.reflect.Type t)
        Get the object held in the JSON object. Converts it to the correct requested Java Object type.
        Parameters:
        jsonInString - String to be searched for the object.
        t - Type of the object being searched.
        Returns:
        Object that was requested

      • objectToJSONStringWithKeyWord

        public static java.lang.String objectToJSONStringWithKeyWord(java.lang.String keyword,
                                                             java.lang.Object object)
        Converts a Java object of a specific type to a JSON string with a keyword as first element.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Keyword to be used at start of the JSON string to identify the string.
        object - Object to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Coverted JSON string containing the keyword and the converted object.

      • arrayToJSONStringWithKeyWord

        public static java.lang.String arrayToJSONStringWithKeyWord(java.lang.String keyword,
                                                            java.util.List<?> arrayList)
        Converts a Java list of a specific type to a JSON string with a keyword as first element.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Keyword to be used at start of the JSON string to identify the string.
        arrayList - List to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Coverted JSON string containing the keyword and the converted list.

      • objectToJSONString

        public static java.lang.String objectToJSONString(java.lang.Object object)
        Converts a Java object of a specific type to a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Coverted JSON string containing the converted object.

      • arrayToJSONString

        public static java.lang.String arrayToJSONString(java.util.List<?> arrayList)
        Converts a Java list object of a specific type to a JSON string.

        arrayList - List to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Coverted JSON string containing the converted list.

        public static java.lang.String keywordToJSONString(java.lang.String keyword)
